sentences.en: We bring together hundreds of thousands of experts to solve important problems for industry and academia.
sentences.cn: 我们汇集了成千上万的专家，以解决工业界和学术界的重要问题。

sentences.en: Although some say that citations for software or data have little currency in academia, they can have other benefits.
sentences.cn: 尽管有些人说对软件或数据的引用在学术界没有什么影响力，它们也能带来其他好处。

sentences.en: Her main reason for returning to academia mid-career was to take advantage of the greater freedom to choose research questions.
sentences.cn: 她在职业生涯中期重返学术界的主要原因是利用更大的自由（空间）来选择研究问题。
